MiddelScene: A DEATH-DEFYING LEAP as the man on the tiny pink trike hits a bump, sending him airborne! Sparks fly everywhere and the wheels start to disintegrate in mid-air, with shocked onlookers running for cover. It's total chaos on the streets of San Francisco!
FinalScene: The ULTIMATE CRASH LANDING! The man is in a hilarious heap on the sidewalk, tangled with the twisted wreckage of the plastic tricycle. His helmet camera is still recording the smoky, sparking aftermath as a crowd gathers, taking photos of the unbelievable scene. Viral gold!
